vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συνευδοκ-έω,
join in approving, give one's consent, [NT+4th c.BC+]; συνευδοκέοντος τοῦ δεῖνα, in forms of sale, [Refs]
__2 with dative of things, consent or agree to a thing, [LXX+1st c.BC+]
__3 with dative person, agree or sympathize with.., [NT]
__II passive, aorist συνευδοκήθην in signification 1.3, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to approve of, give approval; to be willing agree
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to approve of, give approval; to be willing agree
to approve with, another; to agree with in principle, Rom. 1:32; to stamp approval, Lk. 11:48; Acts 8:1; 22:20; to be willing, agreeable, 1Cor. 7:12, 13*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: aprobar ; estar dispuesto, estar de acuerdo con (1CO.7:12,13)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 同意, 認可, 認同, 同情
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 同意, 认可, 认同, 同情
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: ưng thuận; tán thành. σύν (G4862) + εὐδοκέω (G2106)
